backend/main.mo: Motoko canister providing admin‑gated CRUD for events, APK URL management, user profile access, and storage-backed content sections with access control mixins.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON structure.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries of major frontend components, pages, hooks, and config files.
frontend/docs/adsense.md: Guide explaining how to enable Google AdSense via environment variable and client ID.
frontend/docs/android-apk-from-pwa.md: Guide describing how to generate an Android APK from the PWA using Bubblewrap and TWA.
frontend/docs/production-deploy-google-s: Instructions for production deployment and Google Search Console verification for Version 19.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color tokens, light/dark themes, and global element styling.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template with SEO tags, PWA metadata, and root mount for the frontend app.
frontend/public/ads.txt: Placeholder ads.txt file instructing developers to add their official AdSense entry.
frontend/public/manifest.webmanifest: PWA manifest defining app metadata, icons, theme colors, categories, and display settings.
frontend/public/robots.txt: Robots rules allowing crawlers, blocking /me/ admin routes, and referencing sitemap.xml.
frontend/public/sitemap.xml: Static sitemap listing public site routes with priorities and change frequencies.
frontend/public/sw.js: Service worker v19 implementing network-first caching, static asset precaching, and offline fallback.
frontend/scripts/run-prod-build-with-gsc: Node script running the production build and verifying the Google Search Console meta tag before deployment.
frontend/scripts/verify-gsc-meta.ts: Build-time script that checks dist/index.html for the exact Google Search Console verification meta tag and exits with errors if missing.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Defines the application's routing structure using TanStack Router, mapping all public and admin pages to their respective paths.
frontend/src/components/admin/MediaPicke: File picker for images and videos with validation, upload progress tracking, previews, and remove support.
frontend/src/components/AdminGuard.tsx: Component that blocks access to admin-only pages by redirecting non-admin users to the login route and showing an access denied message.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component displaying organization info, quick links, dynamic social links, and a share button with clipboard fallback.
frontend/src/components/HomeBottomNavMen: Mobile-only bottom sheet menu that provides navigation links and a dynamic 'Me' link based on session state.
frontend/src/components/InstallPromptBan: Banner prompting users to install the PWA, offering install and dismiss actions when the app is installable.
frontend/src/components/SettingsSheet.ts: Slide-out settings panel offering theme toggle, share link, PWA install, and APK download options.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Responsive top navigation bar with branding, navigation links, mobile menu, account actions, sharing, and logout handling.
frontend/src/config/branding.ts: Provides default logo path and a helper to resolve branding logo URLs.
frontend/src/config/navLinks.ts: Defines primary navigation links and returns the correct 'Me' link depending on admin status.
frontend/src/config/publicSite.ts: Exports the constant public site URL used across the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor instance based on identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminSession.ts: Zustand store for admin login state with credential validation and session persistence in sessionStorage.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity auth context with login, logout, stored identity loading, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/usePwaInstallPrompt.t: Handles PWA install prompt logic, tracking installability, dismissal, and triggering installation.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend calls for branding, history, membership, clubs, and events with cache management.
frontend/src/hooks/useTheme.ts: Theme hook that loads, applies, and toggles between light and dark UI themes.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers and custom CSS variables for light/dark themes and typography styles.
frontend/src/layouts/AppLayout.tsx: Provides the main page layout with top navigation, footer, and routed content area.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app, setting up React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the public About page with organization story, mission, vision, and values.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAboutPage.tsx: Admin interface for managing About sections with editing, media support, and save functionality.
frontend/src/pages/AdminAndroidApkPage.t: Admin page to configure and validate the downloadable Android APK URL.
frontend/src/pages/AdminBrandingPage.tsx: Admin page for updating branding assets like the organization logo with upload and save features.
frontend/src/pages/AdminClubsManagerPage: Provides a UI for admins to create, edit, and delete clubs using form fields, query hooks, and confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/pages/AdminDashboardPage.ts: Displays the admin dashboard with navigation cards linking to different content editors and a logout option.
frontend/src/pages/AdminEventsManagerPag: Allows admins to create, edit, and delete events with validation, form handling, and mutation hooks.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHistoryEditorPag: Enables editing of the organization’s history text and media with autosave feedback and data loading.
frontend/src/pages/AdminHomePageEditorPa: Lets admins manage home page sections, including titles, descriptions, images, and adding or removing sections.
frontend/src/pages/AdminLoginPage.tsx: Renders an admin login form with username and password, handling authentication, loading states, and error messages. Redirects authenticated admins to the dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/AdminMembershipReview: Displays and manages a list of membership registration submissions with loading, error, and empty states. Provides detailed cards for each registration and navigation back to the dashboard.
Provides a form for viewing and updating social media link URLs, including loading, success, and error handling. Fetches existing links and saves updates through API hooks.
frontend/src/pages/ClubDetailPage.tsx: Shows detailed information for a single club by ID with loading, error, and not‑found handling. Displays club profile, slogan, aims, and other sections using card components.
frontend/src/pages/ClubsPage.tsx: Lists all clubs with loading, error, and empty states, displaying each club in a card with basic info and a link to its detail page. Includes a call‑to‑action section for membership registration.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Renders a contact page with cards for email, phone, address, and office hours.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Fetches and displays upcoming events with loading, error, and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/HistoryPage.tsx: Loads and displays organizational history content with optional media and fallback states.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Builds the homepage with hero content, dynamic sections, and data-driven highlights.
frontend/src/pages/MembershipRegistratio: Provides a membership registration form with submission handling and a success message.
frontend/src/pages/PrivacyPolicyPage.tsx: Shows a scrollable privacy policy outlining data collection, use, and security practices.
frontend/src/pages/ProgramsPage.tsx: Renders a grid of youth programs with icons, descriptions, ages, schedules, and a call-to-action section.
frontend/src/pages/TermsOfServicePage.ts: Displays the Terms of Service in a scrollable card with structured sections and headings.
frontend/src/utils/adsense.ts: Injects the Google AdSense script once using a client ID from environment variables.
frontend/src/utils/media.ts: Provides media validation, file conversion to Uint8Array, preview URL helpers, and file-type checks.
frontend/src/utils/seo.ts: Updates canonical and Open Graph URL meta tags based on the current route path.
frontend/src/utils/share.ts: Shares URLs using the Web Share API with clipboard fallback and detailed success/error handling.
frontend/src/utils/theme.ts: Manages light/dark theme persistence, storage, and DOM application.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Reads, stores, and persists URL parameters with sessionStorage support and hash-query handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending theme colors, fonts, radii, animations, and plugin setup.
project_state.json: Contains the project's current state, including scope, architecture notes, known issues, generated assets, and a list of existing features with metadata.
